name: City-Thopter (Quest 2)
description:
City-Thopter  is a small VR game about flying around a cyberpunk-inspired city.  You can play as either hard to control Bird with Ram-Jets strapped to its wings or a Dragonfly that is much easier to control. 

Important note(s)

- For some reason, the two builds of this game operate on a "there can only be one" policy and as such only one version of the game can exist on the headset at a time.

Unimportant note(s)

- CityThopter_Dragonfly can be played sitting down, for the most part

- both versions of the game are likely to induce motion sickness.
